name: Chantilly's on the Bay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Frequent visitor to Port Vila and our first stay at this hotel. We were pleasantly surprised by the level of accomodation, comfort and overall ambience of this lovely spot. Proximity to town is great and the staff were pleasant - lovely restaurant and the pool is nice although why you would bother with a pool when you can drop in off the end of the private jetty I don't really know!
reviews.title: Great place to drop off

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose Chantilly's for location & restaurant reviews:- we weren't disappointed in either!!!
reviews.title: Best in Port Vila

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: A very clean hotel, with great staff & THE most amazing restaurant "Tilly's". We stayed for a week & every meal there was perfect. And we are hard markers....
reviews.title: Relaxing on the Bay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel was very close to the Port, with lots of options available for shopping & entertainment (none of that stuck in a resort stuff - grrrr).
reviews.title: At least a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Recommend Chantilly's any time & we'll be going back.
reviews.title: a bit of an oasis in vila, attractive, clean, with courteous staff and nice food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: we arrived Xmas afternoon, we were welcomed by very friendly staff. meals were enjoyable. we were lucky enough to share the large balcony that joined both of our rooms, drinks and nibbles at sunset was amazing. Will go back again.
reviews.title: time of our life.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Being a frequent traveller to Port Vila, I stayed at Chantilly's on the Bay expecting an excellent hotel and I was not disappointed.
reviews.title: Great location in tropical paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: As other reviewers have suggested, Chantilly's does have some negatives but as do most hotels in Vanuatu. If you are expecting great five star features and service as in other countries such as Australia, New Zealand, US, UK, etc than Vanuatu may not be the place for you. It can be a bit more relaxed and rough around the edges than other pacific islands but this adds to Vanuatu's charm.
reviews.title: Alan Short

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: I found the service at Chantilly's excellent with every request gladly met. The food at the on-site restaurant Tilly's was of a good (but not great) standard but is on a par with that of other restaurants in Port Vila.
reviews.title: Perfection personified

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was adequate, clean and well appointed without being of a high standard. Some of the rooms appear to have been recently modernised with the addition of LCD televisions, something that all the rooms could do with.
reviews.title: Average room, average stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Chantillys could be the best hotel in Vanuatu with some serious $$ but has to many short comings
reviews.title: Chantillys could be the best hotel in Vanuatu with some serious $$..

reviews.title: Terrible & not enjoyable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service is pretty good, staff are always friendly and helpful
reviews.title: A comfortable resort, with pleasant competent staff, nice views and good restaurant, close to the city.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010
reviews.text: Close to Port Villa (5 min walk)
reviews.title: Excellent Location - Excellent Team - Excellent Restaurant and Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for one night only because in room 10 the bed was that hard it gave us backache. The sofa nearly fell through to the floor. Self contained apartment with no table & chairs. What more can you say really. $1644 for 7 nights with inferior amenities is way too much money. A complaint was made to the manager, Rob, who was very understanding. No other beds or vacant rooms available to us. Gee we thought how can you spend the next 6 nights in a torture bed. Alternate accommodation was found for us at the Holiday Inn resort over the other side. We chose Chantillys because it was on the main road now we were looking at taxi rides in and out at a cost of $12 round trip every time we wanted to go in. I picked Chantillys on tripadvisor recommendations but I bet they did not stay on the unrenovated top floor. Beware of your booking
reviews.title: Beware the beds on top floor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We split our visit to Vanuatu between three nights at Breaka's and three nights at Chantilly's - two totally different styles of accommodation and both equally good in their different ways. Chantilly's is a well located and stylish hotel with a nice pool and jetty to stroll out over the bay. The terrace outside the restaurant is nicely cooled by the breezes and a good place to watch the ships come and go from the harbour. The restaurant is amoung the best in Port Vila (read our separate review).
reviews.title: Great choice for self-contained living close to the city and airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Chantilly's would be ideal if you want a spacious room and to be able to do some cooking for yourself. The kitchen is well equipped and doing your own cooking would be a great way to make the most of the delicious local products from the markets and road-side stalls.
reviews.title: A pleasure doing business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only complaint was that the room (No 1) was rather noisy being close to the aircon/compressors/kitchen or something like this. Sitting on the balcony was not exactly peaceful and opening the door to get out there was a bit of a challenge!
reviews.title: Best choice accommodation for us!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was quieter at night though and our sleep was fine. I would recommend trying to get one of the central and perhaps higher level rooms, which look across the pool area and should be quieter.
reviews.title: a sparkler on the bay

description: Ideally located overlooking the bay. All the rooms have spectacular views across the harbour. Only a 5 minute walk to town and a 15 minute drive to the international airport. Also available: tour desk, beauty spa, outside pool, guest laundry, Tilly's restaurant, room service, air conditioning and kitchenettes.
